channel.title: 🏢 Beijing Jiaotong University on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Beijing Jiaotong University on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: o1-Coder: an o1 Replication for Coding
item.description: O1-CODER replicates OpenAI’s o1 model for coding, integrating reinforcement learning and Monte Carlo Tree Search to enhance System-2 thinking and generate high-quality code with reasoning steps.
